archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0326
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Transtioning customer i expect my existing customer information to be pre populated for confirmation

properties.value: Let's discuss type of data. Account hierarchy? For consumer account hierarchy can be skipped. Payment details (credit card details) would probably need to be entered again. Password for selfcare also needs to be created.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
